title: PM, CM Punjab discuss performance of provincial govt
content:
LAHORE, Jul 2 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Saturday here met Chief Minister Punjab Hamza Shehbaz and discussed matters related to the performance of the provincial government of Punjab.Member National Assembly Usman Ibrahim and provincial ministers Malik Ahmad Khan and Attaullah Tarar attended the meeting.During the meeting, they also discussed the projects for the welfare and well-being of the public.
